commands.title: LM Tools Bridge: Configure Exposure Tools
LM Tools Bridge: Configure Enabled Tools

lmToolsBridge.server.autoStart.description: Automatically start the MCP server on startup.

lmToolsBridge.manager.httpPort.description: Port for the LM Tools Bridge manager HTTP MCP gateway.

lmToolsBridge.useWorkspaceSettings.description: Only honored when set in workspace settings. User/global settings are ignored. When enabled, lmToolsBridge settings are read/written at the workspace scope and override user settings.

lmToolsBridge.tools.enabledDelta.description: Additional exposed LM tool names to enable relative to the default enabled list.

lmToolsBridge.tools.disabledDelta.description: Additional exposed LM tool names to disable relative to the default enabled list. This takes precedence over tools.enabledDelta.

lmToolsBridge.tools.exposedDelta.description: Additional LM tool names to expose relative to the default exposed list.

lmToolsBridge.tools.unexposedDelta.description: Additional LM tool names to unexpose relative to the default exposed list. This takes precedence over tools.exposedDelta. Tools in the built-in default-enabled list remain exposed.

id.description: Stable rule id used to build internal group ids.

label.description: Display label of the custom group.

pattern.description: JavaScript regex pattern for matching tool names, without surrounding slashes.

flags.description: Optional regex flags. Stateful flags like g/y are ignored.

lmToolsBridge.tools.groupingRules.description: Regex-based tool grouping rules. Matching priority is built-in disabled > custom rules > built-in groups. Rules are applied in list order and first match wins.

lmToolsBridge.tools.schemaDefaults.description: Input defaults in "toolName.paramName=value" format. If a schema defines the param and the caller omits it, this default is injected. Invalid entries are ignored. Supported values: quoted strings (double quotes), true/false, numbers, or arrays "{a,b,c}" (elements can be quoted strings, numbers, or booleans; whitespace and empty elements allowed). Unquoted strings and JSON are not accepted. Examples are entry values, not JSON string literals. ';' is only a separator in this description and is not required at the end of actual entries. Examples: lm_findTextInFiles.maxResults=500; tool.param=1; tool.param="MyStr"; tool.param=true; tool.param={6,4}.

lmToolsBridge.debug.description: Controls logging verbosity. "off" logs only plugin status. "simple" logs tool name/input and elapsed time. "detail" adds full tool outputs, including structuredContent.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run bundle
